sql:
SELECT IALL.InstitutionID AS codeNEISPUO , IALL.Name AS name , IALL.Abbreviation AS abbreviation , IALL.Bulstat AS bulstat , IALL.TextInfo AS textInfo , IALL.BaseSchoolTypeID AS baseSchoolTypeID , IALL.DetailedSchoolTypeID AS detailedSchoolTypeID , IALL.BudgetingSchoolTypeID AS budgetingSchoolTypeID , IALL.FinancialSchoolTypeID AS financialSchoolTypeID , IALL.InstitutionDepartmentID AS primaryAddrID , IALL.RegionID AS region , IALL.MunicipalityID AS municipality , IALL.CountryID AS country , IALL.TownID AS town , IALL.LocalAreaID AS localArea , IALL.Address AS address , IALL.PostCode AS postCode , IALL.Email AS email , IALL.Website AS website , IALL.EstablishedYear AS established , IALL.ConstitActFirst AS incActFirst , IALL.ConstitActLast AS incActLast , IALL.IsODZ AS isODZ , IALL.IsProfSchool AS isProfSchool , IALL.IsNational AS isNational , IALL.IsProvideEduServ AS isProvideEduServ , IALL.IsDelegateBudget AS isDelegateBudget , IALL.IsNonIndDormitory AS isNonIndDormitory , IALL.BankIBAN AS bankIBAN , IALL.BankBIC AS bankBIC , IALL.BankName AS bankName , IALL.BankAccountHolder AS bankAccountHolder , IALL.IsInnovative AS isInnovative , IALL.IsProtected AS isProtected , IALL.IsCentral AS isCentral , IALL.IsStateFunded AS isStateFunding , IALL.IsAppInnovSystem AS isAppInnovSystem , IALL.HasMunDecisionFor4 AS hasMunDecisionFor4 , IOD.InstitutionOtherDataID AS instOtherDataID , IOD.SchoolShiftTypeID AS schoolShiftTypeID , IOD.StaffCountAll AS staffCountAll , IOD.PedagogStaffCount AS pedagogStaffCount , IOD.NonpedagogStaffCount AS pedagogNonStaffCount , IOD.PedagogStaffSalary AS pedagogStaffSalary , IOD.NonpedagogStaffSalary AS pedagogNonStaffSalary , IOD.YearlyBudget AS yearlyBudget
 FROM [inst_basic].[InstitutionAll] IALL JOIN [inst_year].[InstitutionOtherData] IOD ON IALL.InstitutionID = IOD.InstitutionID JOIN [core].[InstitutionConfData] ICD ON ICD.InstitutionID=IOD.InstitutionID AND ICD.SchoolYear=IOD.SchoolYear WHERE IALL.InstitutionID = @instid AND IALL.InstType = @instType
 ORDER BY IALL.InstitutionID ASC
